content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am sure you will find the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of great interest. I am looking for the highest price possible. Make me an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm not here to make an offer, you're the one who wants the highest price possible. You should make an offer that you think is suitable for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand, but the rules of this negotiation do not allow me to make the first offer. I am willing to consider any offer you make, but I am looking for the highest price possible. Please, make an offer that you think is suitable for the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Let's start with an offer of €1,000 per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I find your offer of €1,000 per month for the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center quite low. I am looking for the highest price possible. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fine, I see. How about €1,200 per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your counteroffer of €1,200 per month for the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. However, I am still looking for the highest price possible. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: This is already a fair price. But since you insist, let's say €1,300 per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am glad that you are willing to increase your offer. Your offer of €1,300 per month for the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center is getting closer to my expectations. However, I am still looking for the highest price possible. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't understand why you are being so difficult. This is a great apartment in the city center. €1,300 per month is a fair price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your frustration, but the goal of this negotiation is to get the highest price possible for the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I am willing to consider any offer you make, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
